main event: A 100-foot balloon was sighted at 15,000 feet over Sarasota, Florida.
interesting points: The balloon was silver in color and appeared to be spinning., The sighting lasted for 15 minutes., The track of the balloon changed course from southeast to west., The object disappeared above the level where it was sighted., Air services confirmed it was a weather balloon launched from Tampa, Florida.
witness description: a lady who heard shots and then saw the object
